Method Detail

loadMusic

public static void loadMusic(java.lang.String file)
Loads a music file out of the assets folder. Loads OGG, MP3 and WAV files.

Parameters:
file - Path to the file.

play

public static void play()
Plays the music.

stop

public static void stop()
Stops the music.

pause

public static void pause()
Pauses the music.

clear

public static void clear()
Unloads the music file and resets the player. Call this before loading a new music file.

release

public static void release()
Clears and releases any resources used by the player. Should be called once before shutting the game down.

setVolume

public static void setVolume(float value)
Sets the music's volume.

Parameters:
value -

Gets the music's volume.

The music's volume.
